General.Name: Nanning Chemical Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangxi Huaxi Nonferrous Metal Co.,Ltd trades in steel, bulk commodities, and other products in China. It provides professional and technical services, as well as highway and waterway engineering supervision services comprising design consultation, engineering supervision, test and inspection, bidding agency, and other businesses for construction projects in various fields, including highways, water transportation, municipal administration, and construction; and labor services. The company was formerly known as Nanning Chemical Industry Co., Ltd. Guangxi Huaxi Nonferrous Metal Co.,Ltd was founded in 1998 and is based in Nanning, China.
General.Address: Beibu Gulf International Port Building, Nanning, China, 530021
